name: X-Cubed
body:
### Projects
##[Growl for Android](https://github.com/x-cubed/growlforandroid)
An Android application that receives Growl notifications from other devices on the same network.
Installable from the Google Play store: <https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.growlforandroid.client>

##[Second Law](https://github.com/x-cubed/second-law)
A Windows application to automate installation of firmware and applications on USB devices.

##[Event Store Client](https://github.com/x-cubed/event-store-client)
A Node.JS library for connecting to an instance of [Event Store](https://geteventstore.com) using its binary TCP protocol.
Installable from the NPM repository: <https://www.npmjs.com/package/event-store-client>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
